headline: Constellation Brands Prices Offering of Senior Notes
summary: ROCHESTER, N.Y., Oct. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Constellation Brands, Inc. (NYSE: STZ), a leading beverage alcohol company, announced today that it priced the public offering of $500.0 million aggregate principal amount of 4.950% Senior Notes due 2035 (the "notes") for a public offering price of 99.716% of the principal amount of the notes. The notes will be senior obligations that rank equally with all of Constellation’s other senior unsecured indebtedness. Closing of the offering is expecte
